unnormalised: Skill assessments are crucial for informed hiring decisions. We at IIT Madras have observed that targeted assessments significantly reduce time-to-hire by 25%. Ensuring cultural fit, perhaps through scenario-based questions involving festivals like Onam, can further refine candidate selection. This helps identify individuals beyond technical skills, considering factors like problem-solving prowess relevant in, say, Bangalore's dynamic IT sector. A thorough assessment helps save Rs. 50,000 per hire.
